snippet.title: Terra Nil | A Beginner's Guide to Ecosystem Restoration | March 28
snippet.description:
Pre-Order Now: http://terranil.com | Out March 28 on PC & Netflix Games

In chill eco strategy game Terra Nil it's your job to turn a desolate wasteland into a thriving ecosystem. A daunting task, but don't worry: The Beginner's Guide to Ecosystem Reclamation has your back. This leather-bound tome contains all the knowledge you need to reclaim the wasteland, from purifying polluted soil to planting forests. Here's a taster of what you can expect to find in the lovingly illustrated pages of this beautiful in-game guidebook. Don't leave home without it. Terra Nil will launch on mobile (via Netflix) and PC on March 28.
